segment.name: Beginning of message
segment.documentation: BGM, Segment identifying the type of LEDGER message.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment containing the opening and closing dates of the accounting period of the accounting entries and the preparation date of the message.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, Segment containing the number of the used chart of accounts linked to the message and its version number.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment providing currencies which are specific to the LEDGER message.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, for the purpose of providing additional clarification.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A segment group giving information on sender, recipient and intermediary.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment to identify a party.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to provide references which are specific to the concerned party.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to specify contacts and related communication numbers.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment to provide contacts related to the party.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment to provide communication numbers of the contact.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to provide accounting, fiscal, social or legal characteristics of the accounting ledger.

segment.name: Characteristic/class id
segment.documentation: CCI, A segment to identify a characteristic.

segment.name: Characteristic value
segment.documentation:
CAV, A segment to provide the value of the characteristic.
4.1.2 Detail section
Information to be provided in the Detail section:

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments providing information on accounting entries by ledger.

segment.name: Sequence details
segment.documentation: SEQ, A segment giving detailed information on the sequence of the ledger.

segment.name: Account identification
segment.documentation: CPT, A segment containing detailed information identifying the active ledger account number (general, cost or budget account), or for evaluation, of the accounting record concerned or the subsidiary account number of this ledger account number.

segment.name: Financial institution information
segment.documentation: FII, A segment for the purpose of specifying the bank account numbers relating to the specified account.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: A segment group providing the following relevant information for a given period and a specified accounting ledger : record, account number, references, stated value, date and time, quantity and free text, together comprising an accounting record.

segment.name: Index details
segment.documentation: IND, A segment containing the reference to an order number inside a folio, or the sequential number allocated to the entry of an accounting record for a given journal and period.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment containing the number of the source document relating to the accounting record.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, to give an explanation of the accounting entry.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 6: FII-CUX-MOA-SG7 A segment group containing all necessary information for an accounting record.

segment.name: Line item
segment.documentation: LIN, A segment identifying the line item of the accounting entries or records information sequence.

segment.name: Account identification
segment.documentation: CPT, A segment containing detailed information identifying the account number (general, cost or budget account), or for evaluation of the accounting record concerned or the subsidiary account number.

segment.name: Accounting journal identification
segment.documentation: RJL, A segment identifying the source document and the type of accounting records of accounting entries for a given period.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment giving the accountancy dates concerning the accounting record, date of capture, date of source document, date of accounting validation.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, to give a text for the entry describing whether the record is cost, budgetary or have valuation purposes.

segment.name: Payment instructions
segment.documentation: PAI, A segment specifying the settlement method of the accounting record.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment containing references to documents such as the number of the source document, number of the related document, the internal source document reference and the checking reference and tax codes relating to the accounting record.

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: QTY, A segment for the purpose of specifying a quantity relating to the monetary amount of the accounting record.

segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
segment.documentation: TAX, A segment for specifying the duties, tax or fee types relating to the accounting record.

segment.name: Financial institution information
segment.documentation: FII, A segment for the purpose of specifying the bank account numbers relating to the specified record.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment containing the currency details, currencies or currency rates used in the record.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment containing detailed information on the debit or credit trend of the monetary amount, the monetary amount itself in the local currency and possibly the currency code relating to this monetary amount.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments to provide accounting, fiscal, social or legal characteristics of the accounting record.

segment.name: Characteristic/class id
segment.documentation: CCI, A segment to identify a characteristic.

segment.name: Characteristic value
segment.documentation: CAV, A segment to provide the value of the characteristic.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 8: A segment group to provide authentication information.

segment.name: Authentication result
segment.documentation: AUT, A segment to provide authentication results.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to provide the date of the authentication.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments providing information on the totals and the quantities corresponding to the accounting records for verification purposes, this group summarizes all the monetary amounts by account and by period.

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: QTY, A segment indicating the number of accounting entries for a ledger and period.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to provide references related to a ledger or a period.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment containing the date related to a ledger or a period.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation:
MOA, A segment adding up the total amounts of the accounting records for a ledger and period in local currency and in foreign currency.
4.1.3 Summary section
Information to be provided in the Summary section:

segment.name: Section control
segment.documentation: UNS, A service segment used to separate the detail and summary sections.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 10: A segment group providing quantity and amount totals at message level.

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: QTY, A segment specifying the number of sub-periods included in the period covered by the message.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment providing references at message level.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment containing the date which are relevant at message level for verification purpose.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment adding up the total amounts relating to the LEDGER message.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 11: A segment group to provide authentication information.

segment.name: Authentication result
segment.documentation: AUT, A segment to provide authentication results.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to provide the date of the authentication.
